create.long.other: If you haven't downloaded any cores yet, use 'MCST download' to download the cores.

create.flags.xms.other: Initial heap memory for the Java Virtual Machine (JVM)

create.flags.xmx.other: Maximum heap memory for the Java Virtual Machine (JVM)

create.flags.jvm_args.other: Other parameters for the Java Virtual Machine (JVM)

create.flags.core.other: Core ID, use 'MCST download list' to view all core IDs.
